cards.name: Gambling? I'm in!
cards.description: Gambling? I'm in!

faces.name: Gambling? I'm in!
faces.text:
Play this card during your Action Phase to start a Round of Gambling. Each player antes 1 Gold. You are currently winning.
-OR-
Play this card during a Round of Gambling to take control of the Round.
You may not play this card if the last card to take control of the Round was Winning Hand.

cards.name: I raise!
cards.description: I raise!

faces.name: I raise!
faces.text:
Take control of a Round of Gambling.
Each player (including you) antes 1 additional Gold.
If you are unable to pay the ante, the other players do not have to ante.
You may not play this card if the last card to take control of the Round was Winning Hand.

cards.name: I raise!
cards.description: I raise!

cards.description: Winning Hand!

faces.text:

cards.name: Winning Hand!

faces.name: Winning Hand!
faces.text:
Take control of a Round of Gambling.
You may not play this card if the last card to take control of the Round was Winning Hand.

cards.name: Oh, I guess the Wench thought that was her tip...
cards.description: Oh, I guess the Wench thought that was her tip...

faces.name: Oh, I guess the Wench thought that was her tip...
faces.text:
Play this card at any time during a Round of Gamblingto end the Round. All anted Gold goes to the Inn.
You may play this card even if you have left the Round of Gambling. You may not play this card if the Round has already ended or in response to a card that would make players ante or would end the Round when it resolves.

cards.name: Wench, please allow me to pay for these drinks with a song!
cards.description: Wench, please allow me to pay for these drinks with a song!

faces.name: Wench, please allow me to pay for these drinks with a song!
faces.text:
Play this card during the Buy Drinks Phase of your turn. Buy 2 additional Drinks for free. You may place these Drinks face down on any players' Drink Me! Piles.
-OR-
Play this card when the Drink Deck is reshuffled. You don't have to pay.

cards.name: Wench, please allow me to pay for these drinks with a song!
cards.description: Wench, please allow me to pay for these drinks with a song!

faces.name: Wench, please allow me to pay for these drinks with a song!
faces.text:
Play this card during the Buy Drinks Phase of your turn. Buy 2 additional Drinks for free. You may place these Drinks face down on any players' Drink Me! Piles.
-OR-
Play this card when the Drink Deck is reshuffled. You don't have to pay.

cards.name: The Wench thinks you should stop playing with the drinks.
cards.description: The Wench thinks you should stop playing with the drinks.

faces.name: The Wench thinks you should stop playing with the drinks.
faces.text:
Negate a Sometimes Card that changes the effects of a Drink Card. (This includes cards that pass Drinks to other players, cards that split Drinks with other players, and cards that Negate or Ignore Drinks.)
This card can only be affected by I don't think so!

cards.name: Tip the Wench.
cards.description: Tip the Wench.

faces.name: Tip the Wench.
faces.text: A player of your choice must pay 1 Gold to the Inn.

cards.name: I don't think so!
cards.description: I don't think so!

faces.name: I don't think so!
faces.text:
Negate a Sometimes Card.
This card can only be affected by another I don't think so!

cards.name: What's that up your sleeve?
cards.description: What's that up your sleeve?

faces.name: What's that up your sleeve?
faces.text:
Take control of a Round of Gambling
-AND-
Pick one player in the current Round of Gambling and force them to leave the Round. They may not play any more Gambling or Cheating Cards during this Round. Any Gold they have already anted stays.

cards.name: Oops... I dropped my cards...
cards.description: Oops... I dropped my cards...

faces.name: Oops... I dropped my cards...
faces.text: Take control of a Round of Gambling.

cards.name: You know, I should take better care of my dainty figure!
cards.description: You know, I should take better care of my dainty figure!

faces.name: You know, I should take better care of my dainty figure!
faces.text:
Ignore a Drink Card.
(You may look at the Drink Card before deciding to play this card.)

cards.name: I may be a fop, but I can hold my liquor!
cards.description: I may be a fop, but I can hold my liquor!

faces.name: I may be a fop, but I can hold my liquor!
faces.text:
Ignore a Drink Card.
(You may look at the Drink Card before deciding to play this card.)

cards.name: Look at these cards! This must be my lucky day!
cards.description: Look at these cards! This must be my lucky day!

faces.name: Look at these cards! This must be my lucky day!
faces.text: Take control of a Round of Gambling.

cards.name: I do so hate to drink alone...
cards.description: I do so hate to drink alone...

faces.name: I do so hate to drink alone...
faces.text:
Split a Drink you are about to drink with another player. You each take half of the Drink's effects, rounded up.
(You may look at the Drink Card before deciding to play this card.)

cards.name: I do so hate to drink alone...
cards.description: I do so hate to drink alone...

faces.name: I do so hate to drink alone...
faces.text:
Split a Drink you are about to drink with another player. You each take half of the Drink's effects, rounded up.
(You may look at the Drink Card before deciding to play this card.)

cards.name: Leave me be! I'm trying to read lore here!
cards.description: Leave me be! I'm trying to read lore here!

faces.name: Leave me be! I'm trying to read lore here!
faces.text:
Play this card when you must ante to avoid paying and leave the Round of Gambling. You may not play any more Gambling or Cheating Cards during this Round. Any Gold you have already anted stays.
-OR-
Ignore a Drink Card. (You may look at the Drink Card before deciding to play this card.)

cards.name: Oh, Hey! This looks like a serious game.
cards.description: Oh, Hey! This looks like a serious game.

faces.name: Oh, Hey! This looks like a serious game.
faces.text: Play this card when you must ante to avoid paying and leave the Round of Gambling. You may not play any more Gambling or Cheating Cards during this Round. Any Gold you have already anted stays.

cards.name: Fortunately, I had this card up my sleeve! Ha ha, just kidding!
cards.description: Fortunately, I had this card up my sleeve! Ha ha, just kidding!

faces.name: Fortunately, I had this card up my sleeve! Ha ha, just kidding!
faces.text: Take control of a Round of Gambling.

cards.name: A toast! To my friends!
cards.description: A toast! To my friends!

faces.name: A toast! To my friends!
faces.text:
Each player (including you) takes a card from the Drink Deck and drinks it now.
If a Drink Event Card is revealed, discard it without taking its effects and keep revealing cards until a Drink Card is revealed.

cards.name: Appreciative listeners! How nice!
cards.description: Appreciative listeners! How nice!

faces.name: Appreciative listeners! How nice!
faces.text:
Play this card when you would lose Gold. (This includes paying Gold, anteing Gold, or having Gold taken from you.)
Use Gold from the Inn, rather than from your own Stash.

cards.name: I got this from playing in the Town Square.
cards.description: I got this from playing in the Town Square.

faces.name: I got this from playing in the Town Square.
faces.text:
Play this card when you would lose Gold. (This includes paying Gold, anteing Gold, or having Gold taken from you.)
Use Gold from the Inn, rather than from your own Stash.

cards.name: I've composed a poem about our most recent adventure.
cards.description: I've composed a poem about our most recent adventure.

faces.name: I've composed a poem about our most recent adventure.
faces.text: Each other player pays you 1 Gold.

cards.name: Who knew? One of my fans is a priest!
cards.description: Who knew? One of my fans is a priest!

faces.name: Who knew? One of my fans is a priest!
faces.text: Gain 2 Fortitude.

cards.name: Allow me to introduce you to my biggest fan.
cards.description: Allow me to introduce you to my biggest fan.

faces.name: Allow me to introduce you to my biggest fan.
faces.text:
Play this card immediately after another player makes you lose Fortitude. They also lose 2 Fortitude.
You may not play this card if you played a card to reduce or Ignore the Fortitude loss.

cards.name: Excuse me... I think you're sitting on my tuning fork.
cards.description: Excuse me... I think you're sitting on my tuning fork.

faces.name: Excuse me... I think you're sitting on my tuning fork.
faces.text: Pick another player. They lose 1 Fortitude.

cards.name: Oh, I hate it when the strings break!
cards.description: Oh, I hate it when the strings break!

faces.name: Oh, I hate it when the strings break!
faces.text: Pick another player. They lose 2 Fortitude.

cards.name: Oh, I hate it when the strings break!
cards.description: Oh, I hate it when the strings break!

faces.name: Oh, I hate it when the strings break!
faces.text: Pick another player. They lose 2 Fortitude.

cards.name: How about a rowdy drinking song?
cards.description: How about a rowdy drinking song?

faces.name: How about a rowdy drinking song?
faces.text:
Each other player loses 1 Fortitude.
Each player (including you) gains 1 Alcohol Content.
Pay 1 Gold to the Inn.
(...to pay for the broken furnishings)

cards.name: How about a rowdy drinking song?
cards.description: How about a rowdy drinking song?

faces.name: How about a rowdy drinking song?
faces.text:
Each other player loses 1 Fortitude.

(...to pay for the broken furnishings)

cards.name: And now I'm going to play something really sad.
cards.description: And now I'm going to play something really sad.

faces.name: And now I'm going to play something really sad.
faces.text:
Each player (including you) loses 1 Alcohol Content.
Each other player pays you 1 Gold.

cards.name: This is in payment for that heroic ballad I wrote about you!
cards.description: This is in payment for that heroic ballad I wrote about you!

faces.name: This is in payment for that heroic ballad I wrote about you!
faces.text: Pick a player. They must pay you 2 Gold.

cards.name: It seems that Lady Luck is smiling on me!
cards.description: It seems that Lady Luck is smiling on me!

faces.name: It seems that Lady Luck is smiling on me!
faces.text: Take control of a Round of Gambling.
